name: SOUTHERN UTE INDIAN TRIBE
description: Client is a federally-recognized Indian tribe engaged in governmental activities.
sampleDescriptions: General tribal matters; Pine River Indian Irrigation Project; the IRRIGATE Act and the WIIN Act (PL 114-322) implementation; physical infrastructure; the Tribal Labor Sovereignty Act (S.63/H.R.986); t

Indian energy-related legislation, including the Native American Energy Act (H.R.210) and the Indian Tribal Energy Development and Self-determination Act Amendments (S.245); and NEPA matters and shale
